text:
@HackneyAbbott Comical Harries went on to add: we will slaughter covid, in a few days, and send it packing at the date set by  our glorious dear leader, who is currently under his illustrious comfort blanket writing his memories: super man to invisible man, my journey

https://t.co/dEb5HKQgy2
